overview: St. Vagil's new hospital administrator Jerry Fibler, who got his job by romancing the owner, Amanda Hope, is looking to make drastic changes to increase profits. Nurse Farrah, Nurse Black, Nurse Bobbi, and sexy Technician Fisher are all on notice that one or more many lose their jobs. And straight-shooting resident surgeon Dr. Russ may be replaced by a shaky handed so-called "sex change specialist" named Lesdick. Fibler may find out, however, that the top dogs in hospitals are the nurses.
title: The Nurse
